object.name: Video
object.description: This object represents a video file.
object.rst_description: This object represents a video file.

annotations.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.html_description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.rst_description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.name: file_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.name: file_unique_id

annotations.description: Video width as defined by the sender
annotations.html_description: Video width as defined by the sender
annotations.rst_description: Video width as defined by the sender
annotations.name: width

annotations.description: Video height as defined by the sender
annotations.html_description: Video height as defined by the sender
annotations.rst_description: Video height as defined by the sender
annotations.name: height

annotations.description: Duration of the video in seconds as defined by the sender
annotations.html_description: Duration of the video in seconds as defined by the sender
annotations.rst_description: Duration of the video in seconds as defined by the sender
annotations.name: duration

annotations.description: Available sizes of the cover of the video in the message
annotations.html_description: Optional. Available sizes of the cover of the video in the message
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Available sizes of the cover of the video in the message
annotations.name: cover

annotations.description: Timestamp in seconds from which the video will play in the message
annotations.html_description: Optional. Timestamp in seconds from which the video will play in the message
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Timestamp in seconds from which the video will play in the message
annotations.name: start_timestamp

annotations.description: Original filename as defined by the sender
annotations.html_description: Optional. Original filename as defined by the sender
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Original filename as defined by the sender
annotations.name: file_name

annotations.description: MIME type of the file as defined by the sender
annotations.html_description: Optional. MIME type of the file as defined by the sender
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. MIME type of the file as defined by the sender
annotations.name: mime_type

annotations.description: File size in bytes. It can be bigger than 2^31 and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this value.
annotations.html_description: Optional. File size in bytes. It can be bigger than 2^31 and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this value.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. File size in bytes. It can be bigger than 2^31 and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this value.
annotations.name: file_size
